title: BIT-BENDER
author: BIT-BENDER
content: Hello my people I greet all of una, I know many of us go done see that BBC interview of emdee the YouTuber who just made his way to the UK not too long ago, I don't know how una feel about they interview but from my opinion that was a Nigerian painting the image of Nigeria to the world poorly.Firstly I am still yet to understand why he who isn't an ambassador of Nigeria to the UK get such an interview on the BBC station e real shock me, although the news on Twitter is that due to the interview the UK has stopped Nigerian from coming into the US paying attention to those who are coming with student visa.I don't think the interview cause that one, the UK must have been nursing the idea and that interview can just increase their desire to do so, regardless for a Nigerian to speak about Nigerian like that is really embarrassing.I believe we all expect everyone who goes out of the country should try to uplift the image of Nigeria but we can't assure that, this is another story of a Nigerian polluting the image of the country.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: This one na serious matter way concern and e go get effect on many Nigerians maybe not as a parent in per say but, as a youth or even parnegs cef way go like sponsor them wards abroad for studies. Non the less, even parents cef way go like add to their degree. This na direct hindrance to Nigerians archiving this goal. Na as you talk am I try go fine the news online but, na the recap I still manage track. I for like make you post the link of the interview so we for fit follow up.No be lie say if man see better, e no go like come back where no been bright for ram but, this thing way she talk no go well at all. Na this one show say, e no be true and patriotic Nigerian.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Omo, I for like see the link too o. From wetin I gather from the news, the guy say e just wan dey real, but the way I see am nah mild case of busy body dey do am. I mean, why assume such a thing of Nigerians? And even if it's the way things are, I think he should have kept his two cents in, e no dey needed.  This just dey further spoil the reputation of naija youths after our presido go abroad go dey refer our youths as lazy. Honestly, the guy no try at all.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I been see the news online but e no interest me because already I know say na so e dey always be. Anyways I no blame am for that attitude wey him display because him don see am as opportunity and avenue to market himself and gain attention  as na normal Naija man reasoning wey dey find attention but however I see for another news  today wey Dem write am say him dey apologize for the nonsense wey him talk for the interview. Omo I no bother myself with that matter at all as everybody get as e bi them for their own matter o.I no go fit drink Panadol for another man headache o. Ejor o!

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Youk nor go do anything. You sabi the amount of talent and money wey Nigerians wey dey japa go their country dey pump inside there? Calculate the 8 -10 million wey 1 Nigerian student dey pay for MSc and PhD now multiply am by the over 40k students wey dey go there each year. Dem sabi say e go benefit them pass anything. If them really dey serious make dem do like other countries wey nor dey give PR. After school make everybody go house. Even their universities oppose their own idea. Well make we dey watch sha, e jus dey pain me say our naija na anyhow country if not na dem for dey beg us to come there.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: BIT-BENDER on May 24, 2023, 05:46:57 PMI don't think the interview cause that one, the UK must have been nursing the idea and that interview can just increase their desire to do so, regardless for a Nigerian to speak about Nigerian like that is really embarrassing.I believe we all expect everyone who goes out of the country should try to uplift the image of Nigeria but we can't assure that, this is another story of a Nigerian polluting the image of the country.D guy fuck up big time ooo, I see d video but I swear my body weak, u wey just travel recently, u come reach that side u wan come block road for ur fellow brothers wey dey come, we all know why all of us dey run go study for outside but dis kind thing him no suppose talk am for outside now, him fuck up big time, dey suppose hustle d guy carry am come back Naija make dem even flog d guy self, d matter pain me ooo. But make we talk true UK don get d matter for mind no be today, na something like dis dey don dey wait for and person don fuck up already, seriously dey no suppose leave that guy make him go just like that ooo.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Dis matter na something wey shock all of us Nigerians and dey pain most people wey get plans to go study for UK if the government of UK go really take serious action about this matter. The guy was just too much of himself dat he went and spit out anything wey him like for him mouth. Shey na popularity him, now him don get am but in a bad way for himself. But las las, if UK government really do dis tin, dem go lose no be small oo because of the money wey naija people dey pay there for schooling go reduce drastically. We never know how the matter go turn out but I still get hope say dem go review dis judgement again.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Quote from: Asiska02 on May 25, 2023, 10:28:37 PMDis matter na something wey shock all of us Nigerians and dey pain most people wey get plans to go study for UK if the government of UK go really take serious action about this matter. The guy was just too much of himself dat he went and spit out anything wey him like for him mouth. Shey na popularity him, now him don get am but in a bad way for himself. But las las, if UK government really do dis tin, dem go lose no be small oo because of the money wey naija people dey pay there for schooling go reduce drastically. We never know how the matter go turn out but I still get hope say dem go review dis judgement again.I hear say that Nigeria's living in the United Kingdom has disassociated themselves from him and if that's true it's a good thing, he has really painted the country as one that takes school visa a means to migrate to other countries, this fit not only affect the image of Nigeria in united kingdom but this has the potentials of affecting Nigeria even in other countries.Firstly I have friends who should have gone to the UK to practice their profession but this issues has affected them and not they have to change route, I think this is a poor and false image about Nigeria that the government should not take lightly I believe they should speak on the issues and clear the air.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: Quote from: BIT-BENDER on May 24, 2023, 05:46:57 PMI don't think the interview cause that one, the UK must have been nursing the idea and that interview can just increase their desire to do so, regardless for a Nigerian to speak about Nigerian like that is really embarrassing.I believe we all expect everyone who goes out of the country should try to uplift the image of Nigeria but we can't assure that, this is another story of a Nigerian polluting the image of the country.My brother I fit assure you say the interview cause 99% of wetin make UK government take that decision because them for no really get something to hold hand if them wam do something like this but na the guy just spoil the same road wey em take pass go wia em dey now. You know say that interview no only affect people wey wam go UK go study even for Rivers State now our governor wey be Wike dey plan to pass one law now say person wey do any medical related course no fit travel go outside the country until the person don stay at least five years for naija here hustle?. The reason why some naija people dey misbehave when Dem get opportunity cross to obodo oyibo na because them fit say e don better for them finish or say Dem no fit come back again if not tell me why Dem dey talk any how.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Quote from: Smartvirus on May 24, 2023, 07:08:17 PMThis one na serious matter way concern and e go get effect on many Nigerians maybe not as a parent in per say but, as a youth or even parnegs cef way go like sponsor them wards abroad for studies. Non the less, even parents cef way go like add to their degree. This na direct hindrance to Nigerians archiving this goal. Na as you talk am I try go fine the news online but, na the recap I still manage track. I for like make you post the link of the interview so we for fit follow up.No be lie say if man see better, e no go like come back where no been bright for ram but, this thing way she talk no go well at all. Na this one show say, e no be true and patriotic Nigerian.Me self I for no mind to see the link, because I for like to know the purpose of the interview, in the first place. But anyhow the guy no try at all, because im action don spoil things for people wey  want to migrate to dat country through education means. Maybe na careless talk or maybe dem get purpose to grant am dat interview, that na why to watch the full interview for trow more light for the matter to really know why em talk am.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: GiftedMAN on May 27, 2023, 10:51:55 PMMy brother I fit assure you say the interview cause 99% of wetin make UK government take that decision because them for no really get something to hold hand if them wam do something like this but na the guy just spoil the same road wey em take pass go wia em dey now.Wetin d guy do nor dey good. As a married persin wit children, nor be everything dem dey discuss wen children dey around. We all sabi sey dat method na to japa but na pattern everybodi dey use do am. However, I nor blame d guy for d ban and restriction wey UK knack Nigerians for study. The hypocrites wey be UK don already decide to restrict people as dem see sey unexpectedly people took up their offer during dat COVID-19 wey chop their people wella and population explosion come begin happen to dem. Wetin Emdee talk nor worse than wetin Abike talk na sey Nigerians dey go abroad to do drugs and cultism na.QuoteYou know say that interview no only affect people wey wam go UK go study even for Rivers State now our governor wey be Wike dey plan to pass one law now say person wey do any medical related course no fit travel go outside the country until the person don stay at least five years for naija here hustle?I hope he's still drinking his 40years old whiskey and getting high on it. Shameless man. They will send their children abroad but dey put yeye laws for d masses.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.created_time: June 01, 2023, 10:26:07 AMLast edit: June 01, 2023, 01:16:59 PM by Marykeller
comments.body: I no know why em be sae Nigerians wey travel go abroad in the last few years the like turn themselves to blogger as the begin cap non-sense about Nigerians. Them go like castigate Nigerians give the  white people like sae no be Nigeria they dwell in before they travel go abroad. Wetin the vex me most via this guy wey em name na Tiamiayu be sae em be once a police officer before em travel go UK.  Anyway no shaking sha as em don travel go abroad na come see fine environment and organized system of government, em sae make use the opportunity to trend sha. Nothing do am sha, we Nigerians d wait am for here. Em go one day come back to this country come meet us. By then we go explain to am wetin em do whether em d good or bad

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Na pot dey call kettle black, that guy na hypocrite for am to open him basket mouth dey talk so many nonsense about your own brothers give another people. He just show say him na typical Nigeria man wey fit sell him brother for money. For him mind so he won create firm and make funds and make those UK people see am as good person but the truth be say,you wey dey spoil your brother for stranger,na yourself you dey do because those UK people go begin observe and dey look am with one eye.Make una no also forget say Nigerians citizens dey for UK and them no go ever forgive am for spoiling their name because he fit need their help one day. E better say anywhere wey we find ourselves make we shut the fuck up if we no know wetin to talk than to dey criticise your fellow brother because what goes around comes around. Why he come dey apologize,make he get out and make he no come Naija again since he fit do all those nonsense to spoil him motherland. All these type of people na dem dey betray person.
